arm_group.description: We want to use Kupperman Index to assess the severity of climacteric symptoms,and assess the effect of doing exercise fof the climacteric symptoms

brief_summary.textblock: Climacteric symptoms can be treated by doing exercise,not hormone replacement therapy.

clinical_study.brief_title: Chinese Health Ivvestigation Of Nurse Aging

detailed_description.textblock:
Hormone replacement therapy(HRT) is the main therapy to climacteric symptoms. But HRT also
      has a lot of disadvantages, such as cardiovascular disease, breast cancer .In our previous
      investigation,we found that doing exercise is helpful for climacteric symptoms.So we want to
      make a detailed investigation to research it.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

        - Women aged 40-55 who has climacteric symptoms

        Exclusion Criteria:

        - Women who have serious climacteric symptoms and other diseases which could interrupt the
        research.

intervention.description: We want to investigate the effects of exercise on climacteric symptoms
Doing exercise at least 6 months including walking, running, yoga etc.

primary_outcome.description: KMI is the short of Kupperman Index,which is a questionnaire to assesses the severity of climacteric symptoms.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Blood lipid is an index to assess the effect of doing exercise.

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Single Blind (Subject), Primary Purpose: Health Services Research
